name: RPG BOYS FANTASY
description:
The RPG BOYS FANTASY is a puzzle game, in order to make the pictures restored.
But please remember, this game is aiming to make you relax and enjoy life.
So if you cannot get relaxed, you may try "help mode" to Complete Level.
Get involved with fantasy RPG medieval boys.
A game only for adults.
Relax with beautiful handmade illustrations and an exclusive and engaging soundtrack.
Features include zooming in on the full scene, showing full background image, shuffling the remaining pieces, hinting.
If you love RPG, play it!! ❤️ 🧩
